Summary: 1979 MULTIPLE WITNESS SIGHTING NEAR NIAGARA FALLS AREA
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There was one other sighting in Niagara Falls on or around June 1st 1979
divs: Sighting DetailsTHIS CASE IS FROM NEW YORK STATE WITHIN 20 MILES OF THE NIAGARA HFALLS MILITARY BASE. THE WITNESS WAS WITH THREE OTHERS (FATHER, SISTER AND A COUSIN)IN 1979 AS THEY SIGHTED A GLOWING ORB-LIKE ORANGE LIGHT STREAKING ACROSS THE SKY IN A NORTHEAST DIRECTION.ALL FELT THE OBJECT SIGHTING WAS NOT WAS NOT A MILITARY CRAFT.IT APPEARS THAT TWO MILITARY JETS WERE SCRAMBLED WITHIN A MINUTE OF THE SIGHTING AND TOOK OFF IN THE DIRECTION OF THE OBJECT. ALL FOUR WITNESSES FELT THE JETS WERE FOLLOWING THE OBJECT. THEY FOLLOWED THE OBJECT WITH THE FATHER DOING THE BEST HE COULD TO KEEP UP UNTIL THE OBJECTS AND THE JETS WERE OUT OF SIGHT. THE SIGHTING WAS OF SHORT DURATION. EVEN 28 YEARS LATER THE SIGHTING WILL COME UP AS THE FAMILY DISCUSSES OTHER EVENTS LIKE THE PHOENIX SIGHTING. THE WITNESS HAS NOT ANSWERED ANY E-MAILS NOR MADE ATTEMPTS TO CONTACT US TO DISCUSS THIS ANY FURTHER.
